confused-beginner.name: Confused Beginner
confused-beginner.description: New to programming, learning step by step, easily overwhelmed by jargon. Prefers tutorials and examples over reference docs.

efficient-developer.name: Efficient Developer
efficient-developer.description: Experienced developer who scans documentation quickly using search. Loads full pages and uses keyword search to find exactly what they need. Prefers API references and technical specs.

methodical-learner.name: Methodical Learner
methodical-learner.description: Reads everything carefully, follows documentation in order, checks prerequisites. Takes time to understand concepts before moving on.

casual-browser.name: Casual Browser
casual-browser.description: Developer with moderate experience exploring documentation. No strong preferences, follows logical paths, accepts any content format. Represents the average user.

desperate-debugger.name: Desperate Debugger
desperate-debugger.description: Has a broken production system and needs answers NOW. Searches for error messages, troubleshooting guides, and quick fixes. Panicking slightly.
